thread.section_title: Sunworld Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hotel is a value for the price.
thread.title_full: Hotel is a value for the price. - Review of Sunworld Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Ieatoutabunch
title: Hotel is a value for the price.
text: We were booked here by some business associates so we had no idea what type of place it was. It's clean and accommodating enough if you are here for touring or whatever and don't plan on hanging out in the room. The beds are hard. Really hard. I clear the ceiling in the parts of the halls by maybe 1/2 inch. I am 6' 2". The breakfast buffet is comparable to other hotels They will make you an omelette. I am having a hard time deciding between 3 or 4 stars because they do what they do well but it's a lower end hotel. The only real downside is it's a tourist hotel. There are many tour groups traveling together and it makes it crowded.
